name: Tanks (itch) (GlaucusFX)
description:
This is a local multiplayer game inspired by an old flash game. You can challenge your friends to a 1v1 local match like the good old flash days.

Q = Boost

A = Left

D = Right

W = Turret up

S = Turret down

The red button on the top = Shoot

P1 = Right character

P2 = Left character

P1 starts.
